Updated November     pm



Purdue police are investigating four cases of larceny from offices in Young Hall that occurred between  p.m PERIOD on Oct PERIOD  and  a.m PERIOD on Oct PERIOD  PERIOD

Four staff members discovered that a set of Apple or Heyday earbuds was taken from each of their desks PERIOD All four said they had locked their office doors before leaving the day before according to an alert sent out by the Purdue University Police Department PERIOD

Anyone with information is asked to call the Purdue Police Department at  or report crimes anonymously through the WeTip Hotline at 180078CRIME PERIOD The police department encourages students faculty and staff to mark and record the serial numbers of electronics and other valuables PERIOD
